Supermarket snacker wins compensation after breaking teeth on date pit https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/supermarket-snacker-wins-compensation-after-writing-teeth-on-date-pit/JV7FNC2XC5A45H2AKPYYGXHSMY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/supermarket-snacker-wins-compensation-after-writing-teeth-on-date-pit/JV7FNC2XC5A45H2AKPYYGXHSMY/ Hannah BartlettThe company said he should have removed the hard item from his mouth, not chewed on it. Sat, 26 Oct 2024 02:00:00 +0000 A man (not pictured) chomped down repeatedly on what he thought was a nut in a "supermarket snack", and ended up with two broken molars and a broken denture. The "nut" turned out to be a date pit.
